resources.string: Edit the photos group you want to play automatically
Please select the photos that you want to use as user defined photos
You have been selected Auto-Play mode,photos will roll plays itself
You are now in the edit mode,you should exit this mode for adding the user-defined group
Press MENU button and press ENTER to delete the pictures.
Are you sure to select these
You have been selected User-Play mode in which photos will not play by itself but by you
Please insert hard disk or usb which has photos or press back key to exit
photos as your user defined photos?
TV and Device must connect the same Hotspot.
Press the Back button to exit.
You can select less or equals to %1$d photos as you user defined group photos
Please grant the files read and write permissions
Press menu key to edit the photos group you want to play automatically
It is the first one already
